title: (x) Celestial Seasonings logo font - modified Adobe Trajan {Florian}
content:
Hi everyone,

Can someone help me identifiying the font used on the Celestial Seasonings logo ?

Thanks and regards,

Mrs

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012062133/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_58.gif) | 14.77 KB |
author: Mrs

comments.content:
Welcome to Typophile!

I’m pretty sure that this started out as [Trajan](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012062133/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/trajan_pro_complete_vp/?&sample_text=Celestial&sample_size=60), see the ‘E’ bar.  
F

Thanks a lot Florian !  
I never thought of a possible modification of Trajan... you seem to be right.  
I'm really impressed with this font especially the way the letter "A" is displayed.  
Maybe you know a font with this character...

Mrs

You might like [ITC Benguiat](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012062133/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsnerflake/itc_benguiat_1_ot/). Or check out Letterhead Fonts, they have a lot of vintage styles, like [Ross Antique Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012062133/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/rossantiqueroman.php) or [Hertford](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012062133/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/hertford.shtml).

Your suggestions are excellent florian,  
Once again thanks,

Mrs
